name: TVC
description: For Television commercial, I'm highly encouraging you people to contact with me. And I'll not let you down, you will be surprised for my work.

name: Celebrity Show
description: Most people love entertainment show and thats why you people can choose me to run the show as a host.A proper show like celebrity show is suitable for the offer.

name: Anchoring
description: If any one need an anchor to a program, then contact with me. I'll will make sure that this program will be the best program and you people can enjoy the whole time.

name: Opening Monologue
description: Without a good opening of a show can't give you the attraction to see that show. Thats why you people can hire me to start the opening monologue of your show.

name: Political Tv show
description: Political show is the most valuable show. To handle this type of show, you'll need an experience host. Thats why I urge you people to contact with me for hosting your show.

name: Documentary show
description: I prefer wild documentary, so whom are interested to make documentary show can contact with me. I'll give that show a new extra vibe that no one see that before.
